posts.post_text: April 1, 2017 at 9:24 PM#2you can use wildcard to delete multiple showfiles- as of shows with different namesDeleteshow ca*will delete both show "car" and show "castle"use the /b and /s options as described in the manual, to delete showfiles of different type/extensionDeleteshow show_xyz /show /backup /noconfirmhttp://help.malighting.com/view/reference…DeleteShow.html
